Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.CommandProcessor
    The RC interface will be removed in Selenium 3.0. Please migrate to using WebDriver.
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.Selenium
    The RC interface will be removed in Selenium 3.0. Please migrate to using WebDriver.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.ButtonReleaseAction
    Use Actions.release()
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.ClickAction
    Use Actions.click(WebElement)
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.ClickAndHoldAction
    Use Actions.clickAndHold(WebElement)
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.ContextClickAction
    Use Actions.contextClick(WebElement)
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.DefaultSelenium
    The RC interface will be removed in Selenium 3.0. Please migrate to using WebDriver.
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.DoubleClickAction
    Use Actions.doubleClick(WebElement)
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.HttpCommandProcessor
    The RC interface will be removed in Selenium 3.0. Please migrate to using WebDriver.
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.KeyDownAction
    Use Actions.keyDown(WebElement, CharSequence)
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.KeyUpAction
    Use Actions.keyUp(CharSequence)
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.MoveMouseAction
    Use Actions.moveToElement(WebElement)
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.MoveToOffsetAction
    Use Actions.moveToElement(WebElement, int, int)
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.PauseAction
    'Pause' is considered to be a bad design practice.
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.SeleneseTestBase
    The RC interface will be removed in Selenium 3.0. Please migrate to using WebDriver.
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.SeleneseTestCase
    Please consider updating to junit 4 or above
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.SendKeysAction
    Use Actions.sendKeys(WebElement, CharSequence...)
    com.thoughtworks.selenium.Wait
    The RC interface will be removed in Selenium 3.0. Please migrate to using WebDriver.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.CapabilityType.ENABLE_PERSISTENT_HOVERING
    org.openqa.selenium.ie.InternetExplorerDriver.IE_USE_PRE_PROCESS_PROXY
    Use InternetExplorerDriver.IE_USE_PER_PROCESS_PROXY (the one without the typo);
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.BrowserType.OPERA
    Use OPERA_BLINK
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.CapabilityType.PAGE_LOADING_STRATEGY
    Use PAGE_LOAD_STRATEGY instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxOptions.addDesiredCapabilities(Capabilities)
    Use FirefoxOptions.addCapabilities(Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxOptions.addRequiredCapabilities(Capabilities)
    Use FirefoxOptions.addCapabilities(Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxProfile.areNativeEventsEnabled()
    "Native" events are not supported in FirefoxDriver anymore
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.server.DriverFactory.hasMappingFor(Capabilities)
    This method is used in tests only and subject to be removed from the interface
    org.openqa.selenium.Capabilities.isJavascriptEnabled()
    Use is(SUPPORTS_JAVASCRIPT) instead
    org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedConditions.numberOfwindowsToBe(int)
    please use ExpectedConditions.numberOfWindowsToBe(int) instead
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.DesiredCapabilities.opera()
    Use #operaBlink
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions.pause(long)
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxProfile.setEnableNativeEvents(boolean)
    "Native" events are not supported in FirefoxDriver anymore
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver.startClient(Capabilities, Capabilities)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.startClient(Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver.stopClient(Capabilities, Capabilities)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.stopClient(Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedConditions.textToBePresentInElement(By, String)
    Use ExpectedConditions.textToBePresentInElementLocated(By, String) instead
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxOptions.toDesiredCapabilities()
    Use FirefoxOptions.toCapabilities().
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxOptions.toRequiredCapabilities()
    Use FirefoxOptions.toCapabilities().
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions(Keyboard)
    Use the new interactions API.
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions(Keyboard, Mouse)
    Use the new interactions APIs.
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.GeckoDriverService.Builder(FirefoxBinary)
    Use method usingFirefoxBinary instead
    org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver(ChromeDriverService)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver(ChromeDriverService, Capabilities)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver(ChromeDriverService, ChromeOptions)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities)
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver(Capabilities, Capabilities)
    Prefer FirefoxDriver.FirefoxDriver(FirefoxOptions)
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver(FirefoxBinary)
    Prefer FirefoxOptions.setBinary(FirefoxBinary).
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver(FirefoxBinary, FirefoxProfile)
    Prefer FirefoxOptions.setBinary(FirefoxBinary), and FirefoxOptions.setProfile(FirefoxProfile).
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver(FirefoxBinary, FirefoxProfile, Capabilities)
    Prefer FirefoxOptions.setBinary(FirefoxBinary), FirefoxOptions.setProfile(FirefoxProfile)
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver(FirefoxBinary, FirefoxProfile, Capabilities, Capabilities)
    Prefer FirefoxOptions.setBinary(FirefoxBinary), FirefoxOptions.setProfile(FirefoxProfile)
    org.openqa.selenium.ie.InternetExplorerDriver(int)
    Create an InternetExplorerDriverService and then use that to create a RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities) with a DriverCommandExecutor.
    org.openqa.selenium.ie.InternetExplorerDriver(InternetExplorerDriverService)
    Create an InternetExplorerDriverService and then use that to create a RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities) with a DriverCommandExecutor.
    org.openqa.selenium.ie.InternetExplorerDriver(InternetExplorerDriverService, Capabilities)
    Create an InternetExplorerDriverService and then use that to create a RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities) with a DriverCommandExecutor.
    org.openqa.selenium.ie.InternetExplorerDriver(InternetExplorerDriverService, Capabilities, int)
    Create an InternetExplorerDriverService and then use that to create a RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(org.openqa.selenium.remote.CommandExecutor, Capabilities) with a DriverCommandExecutor.
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver(CommandExecutor, Capabilities, Capabilities)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(CommandExecutor, Capabilities).
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver(URL, Capabilities, Capabilities)
    Use RemoteWebDriver.RemoteWebDriver(CommandExecutor, Capabilities), creating a new HttpCommandExecutor.
